name: Glue Tactics
description:
A short game created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021, using the theme "Stronger Together"!

Glue your units together to crush the enemy and reclaim the insect throne!

Control your band of bugs with:

Left click - Move
Right click - Glue
Esc - Restart

---

Code: Erik Singer
Art: Sean Hayden
Music: Garrett Kimball, Dan Straite, PeriTune
